Room.Name: North Gate for Brownhaven
Room.LongDescription: You are outside the north gate of the village of Brownhaven. There is a dusty caravan trail stretching in the distance. It leads both east and west, and disappears out of sight in both directions. A sign post indicates that Oceancrest is west, while Kista is east. A broken pointer hangs on the post, so you have no idea which way to go for the elven city of Hafnia. You do know it's located somewhere in the northern mountains.
